cmp: 分 (to divide/minute/(a measure word)/(a unit of length = 0.33 centimeter), part)
mng: fork in road, bifurcation, branch in road, river, mountain range etc, to branch off, to turn off, to diverge, to stray (from the path), to change the subject, to interrupt, to stagger (times)

exm.mng: At The Crossroads, the name of a famous opera, story from Shui Hu Zhuan
to diverge, to branch off the road, to change (the subject)
interruption, to interrupt (esp. talk), to change the subject
Nancha district of Yichun city 伊春市[Yi1 chun1 shi4], Heilongjiang
